# Day 4

## Summary

Today we will examine genetic text editing. Then we will explore how to create
genetic texts with computer-assisted collation tools.



## Schedule

Time     | Topic                               | Type                    |
:--------| :---------------------------------- |:------------------------|
Morning session 1| Genetic editing, genetic criticism | Presentation, Discussion|
Morning session 2 | Using TEI to mark-up versions              | Digital lab             |
Afternoon session 1 | Computer-Assisted Collation Overview                | Discussion              |
Afternoon session 2 | Collation with Juxta and Collatex           | Digital lab             |
